041public class BolusPermissionChangeReasonRequest extends Message { 
042    public BolusPermissionChangeReasonRequest() {
043
044    }
045
046    private int bolusId;
047    public BolusPermissionChangeReasonRequest(int bolusId) {
048        this.cargo = buildCargo(bolusId);
049        this.bolusId = bolusId;
050    }
051
052    /**
053     * <table border="1">
054     * <caption>Parsed fields for BolusPermissionChangeReasonRequest:</caption>
055     * <tr><td><code>bolusId</code></td><td><code>Bytes.readShort(raw, 0)</code></td></tr>
056     * </table>
057     */
058    public void parse(byte[] raw) {
059        Preconditions.checkArgument(raw.length == props().size());
060        this.cargo = raw;
061        this.bolusId = Bytes.readShort(raw, 0);
062    }
063
064    /**
065     * <table border="1">
066     * <caption>Byte layout for BolusPermissionChangeReasonRequest.buildCargo(...):</caption>
067     * <tr><th>Offset</th><th>Description</th></tr>
068     * <tr><td>0</td><td><code>firstTwoBytesLittleEndian(bolusId) [byte 0]</code></td></tr>
069     * <tr><td>1</td><td><code>firstTwoBytesLittleEndian(bolusId) [byte 1]</code></td></tr>
070     * </table>
071     */
072    public static byte[] buildCargo(int bolusId) {
073        return Bytes.combine(
074                Bytes.firstTwoBytesLittleEndian(bolusId));
075    }
